legacy.title: Legacy
legacy.enable: Enables or disables legacy boot mode

quietboot.title: Quiet boot
quietboot.enable: Enables or disables quiet boot mode (enables plymouth)

uefi.title: UEFI
uefi.enable: Enables or disables UEFI boot mode
uefi.secureboot: Enables or disables secure boot in UEFI mode

core.title: Core
core.disableDefaults: Disables default settings if set to true

locale.title: Locale
locale.defaultLocale: Sets the default locale for the system

services.title: Services
services.enableAvahi: Enables or disables the Avahi service
services.enableNetworkManager: Enables or disables the Network Manager service
services.enableResolved: Enables or disables the systemd-resolved service

fish.title: Fish
fish.enable: Enables or disables the fish shell

zsh.title: Zsh
zsh.enable: Enables or disables the zsh shell

storage.title: Storage
storage.otherDrives: List of other drives in the system

swapFile.title: Swap file
swapFile.enable: Enables or disables the swap file
swapFile.path: Sets the path for the swap file
swapFile.size: Sets the size for the swap file

systemDrive.title: System drive

encrypted.title: Encrypted
encrypted.enable: Enables or disables system drive encryption
encrypted.path: Sets the path for the encrypted system drive

systemDrive.name: Sets the name for the system drive
systemDrive.path: Sets the path for the system drive

gnome.title: Gnome
gnome.enable: Enables or disables the GNOME desktop manager

plasma6.title: Plasma/KDE
plasma6.enable: Enables or disables the Plasma 6 desktop manager

regreet.title: ReGreet
regreet.enable: Enables or disables the Regreet display manager

cursor.title: Cursor theme
cursor.name: Sets the name for the cursor theme
cursor.package: Sets the package for the cursor theme

gtk.title: GTK theme
gtk.name: Sets the name for the GTK theme
gtk.package: Sets the package for the GTK theme

icons.title: Icons theme
icons.name: Sets the name for the icon theme
icons.package: Sets the package for the icon theme

hyprland.title: Hyprland
hyprland.enable: Enables or disables the Hyprland window manager

sway.title: Sway
sway.enable: Enables or disables the Sway window manager

bluetooth.title: Bluetooth
bluetooth.enableManager: Enables or disables the Bluetooth manager

amd.title: AMD
amd.enable: Enables or disables AMD CPU support

intel.title: Intel
intel.enable: Enables or disables Intel CPU support

amd.title: AMD
amd.enable: Enables or disables AMD GPU support

intel.title: Intel
intel.enable: Enables or disables Intel GPU support

nvidia.title: Nvidia
nvidia.enable: Enables or disables Nvidia GPU support
nvidia.package: Sets the package for the Nvidia GPU support

trezor.title: Trezor
trezor.enable: Enables or disables the Trezor service

xbox.title: Xbox
xbox.enable: Enables or disables the Xbox service

yubikey.title: Yubikey
yubikey.enable: Enables or disables the YubiKey service

acme.title: ACME
acme.enable: Enables or disables the ACME service

fail2ban.title: Fail2Ban
fail2ban.enable: Enables or disables the Fail2ban service

freeipaServer.title: Freeipa server
freeipaServer.enable: Enables or disables the FreeIPA server service

keycloak.title: Keycloak
keycloak.enable: Enables or disables the Keycloak service

nginx.title: Nginx
nginx.enable: Enables or disables the Nginx service

mysql.title: MySQL
mysql.enable: Enables or disables the MySQL service

postgresql.title: PostgreSQL
postgresql.enable: Enables or disables the PostgreSQL service

teamspeak.title: Teamspeak
teamspeak.enable: Enables or disables the TeamSpeak service

autoUpgrade.title: Auto Upgrade
autoUpgrade.enable: Enables or disables automatic upgrades (no effect at the moment)

kdeconnect.title: KDE Connect
kdeconnect.enable: Enables or disables the KDE Connect service

libvirtd.title: Libvirtd
libvirtd.enable: Enables or disables the libvirtd service
